Title: ToDo List
Description: ToDo List is a simple WPF based application. It just puts a little note paper on your desktop to take notes. It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ToDo List is a simple WPF based application. It just puts a little note paper on your desktop to take notes. It's developed in C#.

V2.0 has been released!

  • Can run on Windows startup
  • Can be placed at anywhere
  • Always on top option
  • User defined directory
